m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Climate Change Geoengineering Is No Quick Fix November 28th, 2014 by Joshua S Hill   In a world where the renewable energy solution to climate change is a problem bogged down in politics and economics, geoengineering can sometimes look like the perfect solution. As the University of Leeds puts it, “deliberate, large-scale intervention in the Earth’s climate system” sounds wonderful — especially if it bypasses the need to do any actual change down here on Earth.
